short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyse on-page SEO with a single click. A simple SEO tool to create search engine-friendly content that gets more website traffic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Jam by Jammy Digital Introducing SEO Jam by Jammy Digital - your new superhero in Search Engine Optimisation! SEO Jam is a simple SEO tool that helps you create search engine-friendly content that gets more website traffic. This slick Chrome extension takes your page content to the next level by analysing the SEO settings and tells you exactly what you need to know. Here's what makes SEO Jam extraordinary: Title Tag & Meta Description Analysis: SEO Jam quickly identifies your title tags and meta descriptions, providing information on their lengths, helping you craft perfect tags and descriptions for maximum SEO benefits. Word Count: In a click, find out the total word count on your webpage. This useful feature keeps your content aligned with best practices for SEO and user-experience. Indexibility Check: Know if your page is crawlable with the 'Meta Robots' functionality. SEO Jam ensures search engines can find and index your content, boosting your visibility. Heading Analysis: From H1 to H6, SEO Jam has got your headings covered. Get insights on your headings and subheadings, and their structure, helping you create an SEO-friendly content hierarchy. Paragraph & Text Emphasis: The extension lets you see and edit paragraph (

) and bold () tags on your webpage, providing a better content structure for your readers and search engines alike. Link Analysis: SEO Jam examines all your internal and external links, their anchor texts, and their URLs. Keep your linking strategy robust and improve your website's authority. Image Inspection: Understand your images better with SEO Jam! Get details like Alt text, size, dimensions, and file name, which contribute to improved SEO and user experience. Whether you're a newbie or a seasoned pro, you'll find SEO Jam to be your trusted companion in your SEO journey. Supercharge your SEO and watch your website soar in search rankings. Discover your SEO blunders with the click of a button, learn how to rank on the first page of Google, and create epic content that positions you as the leader in your industry. Start using SEO Jam today, and turn your website into a traffic magnet! This extension will also allow you to access a free SEO training video on how to use the tool along with best SEO practices.
